short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Effortlessly save and review your Pokémon Showdown battles in a Battle History.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension adds a Battle History to Pokémon Showdown. Similar to the Vs. Recorder from Pokémon Platinum, the user can save battles and analyze it in the Battle History.

Features:
- Track your rating in an Elo Chart
- Save your opponent's team, rating and username
- See what you and your opponent picked in VGC modes
- Access to whole Battle Log

Simply click the "Save & Close Battle" button after a battle is finished, and the battle will be successfully saved in the Battle History. You can open the Battle History by clicking the button below the "Friends" button in Pokémon Showdown.
